name: Otto (itch) (Noah Ratcliff)
description:
Build and fly gliders just like German aviation pioneer Otto Lilienthal did in the 19th century. 

See in-game instructions for how to play.

Made for Ludum Dare 43, for which the theme was "Sacrifices must be made"

Music source:

Gymnopedie No. 1 Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
